content: the reversible brioche beanie is knitted in the round from the bottom up working with two colors in brioche stitches which makes the beanie reversible / double sided using techniques as cast on knitting in the round knitting with double pointed needles yarn over knitting and purling brioche stitches decreasing right and left in brioche cast off weaving in ends pattern features - reversible design - clear step-by-step instructions - light and wearable sizing - s/m fits a head circumference of approximately 54 cm - 56 cm - m/l fits a head circumference of approximately 56 cm - 58 cm gauge - 10 cm x 10 cm = 17 stitches x 27 row materials needed - 50g 100g of lana grossa cool wool + 25g 50g of alpaca silver from katia concept - circular needles size 4 mm length 40 cm - double-pointed needles size 3 5 mm - tapestry needle for weaving in ends - stitch markers - optional elastic thread for added elasticity color suggestions example 1 s/m color 1 lana grossa cool wool in color 2068 burgundy color 2 alpaca silver from katia concept in color 269 mint example 2 m/l both colors in lana grossa cool wool color 1 2021 green color 2 2045 pink it is recommended that at least one of the yarns be merino wool to help maintain the beanie s shape this is a digital download pdf with detailed instructions no physical item will be shipped
